articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: SA vs IND, 2nd T20I: Rinku Singh 'sorry' for breaking media box glass after sensational fifty in South Africa - India Today
articles.description: India tour of South Africa: Rinku Singh, speaking to the BCCI after the 2nd T20I, revealed he was not aware that his six in the 19th over of the innings broke the glass window of the media box at St George's Park on Tuesday, Decmeber 12.
articles.content: Rinku Singh went on a six-hitting spree in the second T20i between South Africa and India at St George's Park, showcasing his composure in tricky conditions on Tuesday, December 12. The young Kolkata… [+2936 chars]
